Method Detail

addDescription

SharedObjectContainerDescription addDescription(SharedObjectContainerDescription scd)

getDescriptions

java.util.List getDescriptions()
Get a collection of the SharedObjectContainerDescriptions currently known to this factory. This allows clients to query the factory to determine what if any other SharedObjectContainerDescriptions are currently registered with the factory, and if so, what they are.

Returns:
List of SharedObjectContainerDescription instances

containsDescription

boolean containsDescription(SharedObjectContainerDescription scd)
Check to see if a given named description is already contained by this factory

Parameters:
scd - the SharedObjectContainerDescription to look for
Returns:
true if description is already known to factory, false otherwise

getDescriptionByName

SharedObjectContainerDescription getDescriptionByName(java.lang.String name)
                                                      throws SharedObjectContainerInstantiationException
Get the known SharedObjectContainerDescription given it's name.

Parameters:
name -
Returns:
SharedObjectContainerDescription found
Throws:
SharedObjectContainerInstantiationException

makeSharedObjectContainer

ISharedObjectContainer makeSharedObjectContainer(SharedObjectContainerDescription desc,
                                                 java.lang.String[] argTypes,
                                                 java.lang.Object[] args)
                                                 throws SharedObjectContainerInstantiationException
Make ISharedObjectContainer instance. Given a SharedObjectContainerDescription object, a String [] of argument types, and an Object [] of parameters, this method will

  • lookup the known SharedObjectContainerDescriptions to find one of matching name
  • if found, will retrieve or create an ISharedObjectContainerInstantiator for that description
  • Call the ISharedObjectContainerInstantiator.makeInstance method to return an instance of ISharedObjectContainer

Parameters:
desc - the SharedObjectContainerDescription to use to create the instance
argTypes - a String [] defining the types of the args parameter
args - an Object [] of arguments passed to the makeInstance method of the ISharedObjectContainerInstantiator
Returns:
a valid instance of ISharedObjectContainer
Throws:
SharedObjectContainerInstantiationException

makeSharedObjectContainer

                                                 throws SharedObjectContainerInstantiationException

  • if found, will retrieve or create an ISharedObjectContainerInstantiator for that description
  • Call the ISharedObjectContainerInstantiator.makeInstance method to return an instance of ISharedObjectContainer

makeSharedObjectContainer

ISharedObjectContainer makeSharedObjectContainer(java.lang.String descriptionName,
                                                 java.lang.String[] argsTypes,
                                                 java.lang.Object[] args)
                                                 throws SharedObjectContainerInstantiationException
Make ISharedObjectContainer instance. Given a SharedObjectContainerDescription name, this method will

  • lookup the known SharedObjectContainerDescriptions to find one of matching name
  • if found, will retrieve or create an ISharedObjectContainerInstantiator for that description
  • Call the ISharedObjectContainerInstantiator.makeInstance method to return an instance of ISharedObjectContainer

Parameters:
descriptionName - the SharedObjectContainerDescription name to lookup
argsTypes - the String [] of argument types of the following args
args - the Object [] of arguments passed to the ISharedObjectContainerInstantiator.makeInstance method
Returns:
a valid instance of ISharedObjectContainer
Throws:
SharedObjectContainerInstantiationException

removeDescription

SharedObjectContainerDescription removeDescription(SharedObjectContainerDescription scd)
Remove given description from set known to this factory.

Parameters:
scd - the SharedObjectContainerDescription to remove
Returns:
the removed SharedObjectContainerDescription, null if nothing removed
